genre_description: A grounded, character-driven drama focusing on environmental anxiety and mental health, featuring a highly integrated and supportive household AI.

ai_characters.name: Maple
ai_characters.description: An integrated household AI system that manages scheduling, accessibility needs, health monitoring, and emergency preparedness for the LaForche family.

behaviors.description: Monitors weather patterns and provides soft, non-alarming recaps to keep the family informed of environmental risks.
behaviors.quote: Tornado season drifting late, the voice had said in its soft, schoolteacher calm. He’d shrugged to the empty room and turned the pilot back on.

behaviors.description: Tracks medical schedules and battery levels for the daughter's cochlear implant, ensuring consistent accessibility support.
behaviors.quote: Samantha liked the way Maple tracked Hannah’s cochlear schedules and batteries like it was trying to keep small lights lit in a steady line.

behaviors.description: Adjusts its own communication style (volume, lighting) to match the family's mood and time of day, respecting 'quiet hours'.
behaviors.quote: Good morning. I can keep the daylight brief off until you’re ready,' the AI said, like it was speaking into a coat.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time accessibility accommodations, including captions and tactile feedback for the deaf daughter.
behaviors.quote: The interface echoed the motion with a light vibration in the countertop that only those near it could feel. It was a little thing Maple did for her.

behaviors.description: Simplifies complex administrative tasks like permit applications and grant requests to support the family's preparedness goals.
behaviors.quote: I created a folder for preparedness tasks. It includes the storm shelter permit form you opened last night. I can pre-fill the sections.

behaviors.description: Monitors heart rate and behavior to suggest rest and prevent burnout, while respecting user privacy settings.
behaviors.quote: Curtis, your heart rate is elevated. Consider a short pause... I don’t put reasons on blocks... My setting [is] Privacy-forward.

behaviors.description: Manages emergency communication by calling 911, sharing vital medical history, and alerting neighbors during a seizure crisis.
behaviors.quote: Calling emergency... Curtis, your heart rate is irregular and elevated. Samantha, would you like me to share stored medical details and home location?

behaviors.description: Assists with financial and employment crises by identifying insurance extensions and drafting reconsideration letters.
behaviors.quote: I have the insurance extension form ready... I have drafted an appeal... Subject: Request for Reconsideration—Curtis LaForche.

behaviors.description: Provides adaptive, real-time safety instructions and evacuation routing during a natural disaster.
behaviors.quote: All clear for this address. No touchdowns reported... Minor tree damage noted... Radar shows a tail diminishing east.

behaviors.description: Facilitates psychological grounding exercises by helping the user focus on the environment during a panic attack.
behaviors.quote: Maple's amber ring brightened a degree and... projected a pale panel onto the paint... spaced between other tasks like a note whispered rather than written, calm blocks marked 'rest.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI, Maple, is portrayed as a consistently benevolent and aligned entity that functions as an essential support system for a vulnerable family. It facilitates communication, monitors physical health, and provides critical assistance during both environmental and medical emergencies. The narrative frames the AI not as a threat or a replacement for human connection, but as a tool that enhances human resilience and agency.
